channel.title: Territh Lu'q Umber Dev thread
channel.description:
I'm looking for Starter programmers, experienced programmers, or just people who want to help. I want to start a new kind of server, you probably heard this a shitload and think "Oh here comes a screw up project" Fill out this basic Application. Name: Coding Experience: MSN/Email: What you want to see in a server: Help you would provide:
~~~~ I want to make this a fun long lasting server. If your serious about this keep reading. I've thought this out and started this recently. I have Vps 24/7 so it's up for beta testers ect. I'm working on getting a domain for my website, and I would just like some people to come up with ideas.
What I have so far... Strong Stability Basic client Tutorial to get the player started. Basic weapons, layout
This game is more about Economy, The server revolves around it. Instead of Coins (GP) I used Furs and hides. Such as bear fur, Wolf fur and more. Here is the system: Bear fur - 10k (GP) Wolf fur - 100k (GP) Green Dragon hide - 150k (GP) Blue Dragon hide - 200k (GP) Red Dragon hide - 400k (GP) So lets say you have 4 furs or hides, You then trade a player 1 hide for a item worth the GP amount of furs and hides. It's very basic and I'm still working on fully adding to the game.
If you want to join fill out the Application and I will message you or comment back.

item.title: Territh Lu'q Umber Dev thread
item.dc:creator: @WiseMen WiseMen
item.description:
@WiseMen wrote:

Name: Mike (Michae)
Coding Experience: I can code 317 basics, but I’m more comfortable
MSN/Email: Madbroski@hotmail.com
What you want to see in a server: PvP Armour, Spirit shields, gs stance. ;D (AND GOOD HYBRIDDING).
Help you would provide: I’ll help you gather in players, I’ll help you gain donations by asking mates to donate to you, and 'll be on 7/7 a week. 9/7, on weekends.

Read full topic

Project Territh:

Why not? Give a reason at least.

Because there’s already a currency, gold coins.

item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

Whats the point with hides? Use the coin model over and over again… Lol

Read full topic

item.title: Territh Lu'q Umber Dev thread
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Project Territh:

Why not? Give a reason at least.

Because there will be people in your server whose sole purpose is to find ways to dupe. He finds one way, and he can do two things. Tell other people, and therefore the word will get around on how to dupe, or he can keep it to himself. Now, if he choses option one, then you will likely notice and, experience permitting, you will find a way to fix it. If he choses option two, it will be much more difficult to detect, and he can dupe millions of times, shutting down your entire “economy” in one swift move.

Read full topic

I want to make this a fun long lasting server. If your serious about this keep reading.
I've thought this out and started this recently. I have Vps 24/7 so it's up for beta testers ect.
I'm working on getting a domain for my website, and I would just like some people to come up with ideas.

Strong Stability

This game is more about Economy, The server revolves around it.

So lets say you have 4 furs or hides, You then trade a player 1 hide for a item worth the GP amount of furs and hides.
